::Killer/Annihilator/Zeus/Ares::

Killer walks out of the base behind Shuko, looking at his scanner with a 
thoughtful look on his face.

"Shuko, the scann'es 'ave picked up an unussually strong energon radiation. I 
suggest sendin' several bots to check i' out."

"Ah! Energon radiation my skid late," Annihilator, walking out of the base 
behind Killer, says, "I want to fight!"

Killer turns around with an annoyed look on his face. "This energon 
interference could endanger us in the future. Taking care of it now would 
save alot of troube."

Annihilator shrugs. "Fine. I still wanna fight though."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus and Ares walk out of the base to join the bots already standing there.

"We are ready for battle, sir," Ares says. Zeus nods.
